summary: Provides mixin classes that encapsulate the logic for constructing k2 emission graphs, preparing supervision tensors, and computing CTC and RNNT style loss values, including gradient normalization and pruning utilities, to be integrated into ASR model implementations.
business_intent: Facilitate the training of automatic speech recognition systems by offering reusable components that compute efficient CTC and RNNT losses using the k2 library, thereby accelerating model development and improving accuracy.
